title: Can't Use Cutpurse Twisted Fate Skin
body: I saw it was disabled last night, the notification isn't there anymore so it makes me think it should be playable.  Not sure if it's still disabled though.  Very frustrating because I just bought it!

replies.body:
Hey MrNickyGM - 

Sorry about this! 

The skin should no longer be disabled. We disabled this skin due to a readability issue with his (W) Pick a Card. The overhead particle wasn't displaying properly.
